name: KALIMANTAN WILDLIFE
description:
KALIMANTAN WILDLIFE

the platformer game with a retro style, with the environment from Kalimantan (Borneo).

The game is about the forest ranger who will save the forest from the illegal loggers

EARLY ACCESS

note : Android only, recommended play in display resolution 1080p

you can send us feedback with this form
